title: Person Of Interest - US Marshall Scene
author: NZHiphopscaper
comment: Reese is such a bad ass that his suit knows when to button itself.

Classic Reese. 

Going into a room or building. Kicking everyones asses. Walking out like a badass.

That poor kid at the end, just trying to do his job, lol.

The best parts of these scenes is Finch's horrified expression when Reese does stuff like this, though.
You know what's best about this scene? The delivery. When he says "I will kill you." It's like it's not even a threat, or something up for debate. It's just a fact.

“What will you do, Mr. Reese?”
“Show him what a real monster looks like.”

Chills.
